verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> Behold I have hearkened בְקֹֽלְכֶ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> unto your voice לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you אֲמַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H559><s%> in all that ye said לִ֑י וָאַמְלִ֥יךְ <S%H4427><s%> unto me and have made עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> a king

וְעַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> here הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ ׀ <S%H4428><s%> And now behold the king מִתְהַלֵּ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walketh לִפְנֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I am זָקַ֣נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> you and I am old וָשַׂ֔בְתִּי <S%H7867><s%> and grayheaded וּבָנַ֖י <S%H1121><s%> and behold my sons הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I הִתְהַלַּ֣כְתִּי <S%H1980><s%> [are] with you and I have walked לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before מִנְּעֻרַ֖י <S%H5271><s%> you from my childhood עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> even הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> behold עֲנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> Behold here I [am] witness בִי֩ נֶ֨גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> against me before the LORD וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before מְשִׁיח֗וֹ <S%H4899><s%> and before his anointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שׁוֹר֩ ׀ <S%H7794><s%> whose ox מִ֨י <S%H4310><s%> Whose לָקַ֜חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> have I taken וַחֲמ֧וֹר <S%H2543><s%> ? or whose ass מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> whose לָקַ֗חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> have I taken וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> whom עָשַׁ֙קְתִּי֙ <S%H6231><s%> ? or whom have I defrauded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> whose רַצּ֔וֹתִי <S%H7533><s%> ? whom have I oppressed וּמִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> ? or of whose hand מִי֙ <S%H4310><s%> Whose לָקַ֣חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> taken כֹ֔פֶר <S%H3724><s%> have I received [any] bribe וְאַעְלִ֥ים <S%H5956><s%> to blind עֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes בּ֑וֹ וְאָשִׁ֖יב <S%H7725><s%> therewith? and I will restore לָכֶֽם׃

וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> have not עֲשַׁקְתָּ֖נוּ <S%H6231><s%> Thou hast not defrauded וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or רַצּוֹתָ֑נוּ <S%H7533><s%> us nor oppressed וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> or לָקַ֥חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> us neither hast thou taken מִיַּד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of any man's מְאֽוּמָה׃ <S%H3972><s%> ought

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about עֵ֧ד <S%H5707><s%> [is] witness יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them The LORD בָּכֶ֗ם וְעֵ֤ד <S%H5707><s%> [is] witness מְשִׁיחוֹ֙ <S%H4899><s%> against you and his anointed הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> not מְצָאתֶ֛ם <S%H4672><s%> that ye have not found בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> in my hand מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> ought וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And they answered עֵֽד׃ <S%H5707><s%> [He is] witness פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [It is] the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> that advanced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וַאֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> and who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> your fathers מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <S%H3320><s%> Now therefore stand still וְאִשָּׁפְטָ֥ה <S%H8199><s%> that I may reason אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> concerning לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> with you before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צִדְק֣וֹת <S%H6666><s%> of all the righteous acts יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> which he did אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> concerning וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> concerning אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> to you and to your fathers

כַּֽאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> was come יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> When Jacob מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> cried אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> and your fathers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> then the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> and Aaron וַיּוֹצִ֤יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> which brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1><s%> your fathers מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt וַיֹּשִׁב֖וּם <S%H3427><s%> and made them dwell בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַֽיִּשְׁכְּח֖וּ <S%H7911><s%> And when they forgat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וַיִּמְכֹּ֣ר <S%H4376><s%> he sold אֹתָ֡ם <S%H853><s%> בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> them into the hand סִֽיסְרָא֩ <S%H5516><s%> of Sisera שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> captain צְבָ֨א <S%H6635><s%> of the host חָצ֜וֹר <S%H2674><s%> of Hazor וּבְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וּבְיַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they fought בָּֽם׃

וַיִּזְעֲק֤וּ <S%H2199><s%> And they cried אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> answer ק) חָטָ֔אנוּ <S%H2398><s%> We have sinned כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because עָזַ֙בְנוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> because we have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַנַּעֲבֹ֥ד <S%H5647><s%> and have served אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H1168><s%> Baalim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעַשְׁתָּר֑וֹת <S%H6252><s%> and Ashtaroth וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now הַצִּילֵ֛נוּ <S%H5337><s%> but now deliver מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> us out of the hand אֹיְבֵ֖ינוּ <S%H341><s%> of our enemies וְנַעַבְדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> and we will serve

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרֻבַּ֣עַל <S%H3378><s%> Jerubbaal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּדָ֔ן <S%H917><s%> and Bedan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִפְתָּ֖ח <S%H3316><s%> and Jephthah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵ֑ל <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel וַיַּצֵּ֨ל <S%H5337><s%> and delivered אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> מִיַּ֤ד <S%H3027><s%> you out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיכֶם֙ <S%H341><s%> of your enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side וַתֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and ye dwelled בֶּֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> safe

וַתִּרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> And when ye saw כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that נָחָ֞שׁ <S%H5176><s%> that Nahash מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּוֹן֮ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> came עֲלֵיכֶם֒ <S%H5921><s%> against וַתֹּ֣אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> against you ye said לִ֔י לֹ֕א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> but מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto me Nay but a king יִמְלֹ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign עָלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> over וַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> over us when the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God מַלְכְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H4428><s%> [was] your king

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> here הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Now therefore behold the king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you בְּחַרְתֶּ֖ם <S%H977><s%> whom ye have chosen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> you שְׁאֶלְתֶּ֑ם <S%H7592><s%> [and] whom ye have desired וְהִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold נָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> hath set יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and behold the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> over מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> a king

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If תִּֽירְא֣וּ <S%H3372><s%> If ye will fear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5647><s%> and serve אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> וּשְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8085><s%> him and obey בְּקֹל֔וֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not תַמְר֖וּ <S%H4784><s%> and not rebel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וִהְיִתֶ֣ם <S%H1961><s%> then גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> both אַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> then shall both ye and also the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> that reigneth עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> over אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> over you continue following יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> you will not תִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> But if ye will not obey בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמְרִיתֶ֖ם <S%H4784><s%> but rebel אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> against the commandment יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְהָיְתָ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> then יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> then shall the hand יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּכֶ֖ם וּבַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> be against you as [it was] against your fathers

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Now therefore עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now הִתְיַצְּב֣וּ <S%H3320><s%> stand וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> this great הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עֹשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> will do לְעֵינֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> before your eyes

הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not קְצִיר־ <S%H7105><s%> harvest חִטִּים֙ <S%H2406><s%> [Is it] not wheat הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age אֶקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> bewray אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְיִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and he shall send קֹל֖וֹת <S%H6963><s%> thunder וּמָטָ֑ר <S%H4306><s%> and rain וּדְע֣וּ <S%H3045><s%> that ye may perceive וּרְא֗וּ <S%H7200><s%> and see כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that רָעַתְכֶ֤ם <S%H7451><s%> that your wickedness רַבָּה֙ <S%H7227><s%> [is] great אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲשִׂיתֶם֙ <S%H6213><s%> which ye have done בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִשְׁא֥וֹל <S%H7592><s%> in asking לָכֶ֖ם מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> you a king ס

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> So Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> sent יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD קֹלֹ֥ת <S%H6963><s%> thunder וּמָטָ֖ר <S%H4306><s%> and rain בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיִּירָ֨א <S%H3372><s%> feared כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people מְאֹ֛ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H8050><s%> and Samuel

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שְׁמוּאֵ֤ל <S%H8050><s%> And Samuel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֔אוּ <S%H3372><s%> Fear אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You עֲשִׂיתֶ֔ם <S%H6213><s%> not ye have done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָ֖ה <S%H7451><s%> all this wickedness הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> yet אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תָּס֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H5493><s%> yet turn not aside מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> from following יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H5647><s%> but serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> with all your heart
